entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
